body.name: Olivia Care Bath & Body Bar Mandarin Soap 4 Pack Gift Box Organic, Vegan & Natural Contains Olive Oil Repairs, Hydrates, Moisturizes & Deep Cleans Good for Sensitive Dry Skin Made in USA

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 30 mins
features: INFUSED WITH OLIVE OIL & MANDARIN: Olive oil is known to be a perfect skin Moisturizer and gives a very clean and buttery feel. It gives a very gentle and clean feel to skin and help in relieving Eczema and Psoriasis and Acne. Mandarin on the other hand is infused with Vitamin C and helps with healing of skin cells, retain moisture and increase skin circulation.
ALL NATURAL: The Bar is made with 100% Natural Ingredients. Its Suitable for all skin types namely with Acne, Oily and Sensitive Skin. It also has a natural fragrance from the Provence of France.

DEEP CLEAN, MOISTURIZE & HYDRATE: Soap will moisturize and hydrate your skin and protect it from drying out during your daily beauty regimen. It Provides the necessary hydration to make your skin healthy. The Non-Irritating Soap creates the Right amount of Lather and exfoliates your Skin making it fresh and Healthy.

CRUELTY FREE & MADE IN USA: The Product has never been tested on animals. It is non- GMO and free of Parabens, Phthalates, Alcohol and other harmful chemicals. It is being completely made, Triple Milled and Manufactured in the United States of America.

SAVING THE PLANET: Using a bar soap will significantly reduce wastage by eliminating the use of plastic containers. Olivia Care Bar Soaps are made with Natural Ingredients which is not only good for your skin but also helps with the betterment of our Planet.
body.description: Olivia Care set of 4 oval shaped soaps infused with pure olive oil and naturally therapeutic essential oils from the Provence region of France. Enjoy!Celebrate any occasion with our soap boxes! Our beautiful gift boxes are wrapped to go and ready to give. Inside, you’ll find 4 individual 5 oz. oval shaped soaps. Each bar is enriched with pure olive oil and mandarin. The hydrating lather cleanses gently as it moisturizes and protects, while the fresh scent of pure mandarin essential oil awakens the skin.Ingredients:Sodium Palmate (Palm Oil), Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Olea Europaea Fruit (Olive) Oil, Parfum (Essential Oil), Sodium Chloride. *82% Organic Ingredients

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Available in Green Tea, Lavender, Mandarin & Verbena Our bar soaps are enriched with organic olive oil and pure essential oils. With a hydrating lather that gently cleanses and moisturizes as it protects, This bar soap will leave you feeling refreshed without any residual buildup. Crafted with Care in California Our milling process beautifully blends the soap base with our essential oils, fragrances, exfoliates or other extras our soaps include while pressing out unnecessary moisture and air. This French style of pressing soap helps create a more supple longer lasting soap bar that gives your skin a glorious cleanse and high hydration. VEGAN, GMO FREE, & CRUELTY FREE!

Hydrate and Cleanse Natural ingredients help to hydrate your hands while cleansing, saving the need for added moisture. Made with Organic Olive Oil All Olivia Care soaps are infused with organic olive oil. The hydrating lather cleanses gently as it moisturizes and protects. Gentle Formulation for Everyday Use Massage soap on face and/or body, then rinse thoroughly. Keep your bar soap stored away from your shower head or sink faucet for longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Large bars, curved to not sit in water. Heavenly scent. Quality soap that is soft and rinses off without junky film left on skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetical and environmental perfection!
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a USA-made soap containing organic ingredients, long-lasting and fully packaged with recyclable material? Yes, here it is! Other natural/organic soaps that I have used seem to dissolve before your very eyes, but this bar is truly hard milled and comes is a lovely cardboard box as pictured. However, let's not forget how moisturizing this product is, and the mandarin choice is a very delicate, yet exotic, orange scent. And lastly--but not leastwise by any stretch of the imagination--this hard milled soap is a bargain considering its longevity; and, as my dearly deceased father would advise: "Pay now, or pay later," and "You get what you pay for".... Thank you, and well done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS SOAP!
reviews.reviewText: 1. I bought the lavender because that’s my favorite scent. I took a bar out and set it in my shower and a few hours later I went into the bathroom and thought “what’s that smell?“ and then I realized, that I was smelling the lavender from the soap! It was wonderful to be able to smell the soap as if I had sprayed air freshener in the bathroom. It has a rich, deep lavender scent that smells like you’re in a lavender hot house and this was just the dry soap sitting on the soap dish in the shower.2. When I use the soap in my shower it was so soft and luxurious feeling that it was just fabulous! It lathers up so rich and creamy that it just feels very indulgent! A full 24 hours later, I was still able to smell, though faintly, the scent of lavender on my skin. It left my skin feeling soft and smooth, too.3. Also, being a vegan for over 15 years, I am so pleased that it’s also vegan!This will be my bar soap going forward! I highly recommend this soap if you like the scent of lavender. 🙌🏼❤️🌱

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful bath soap.
reviews.reviewText: This soap! It is an absolutely wonderful product. Clean feeling yet doesn't dry your skin. The only disappointment is that there is very little fragrance to it. I was looking for a "pretty-smelling" bath soap, but it is so well- balanced the low fragrance is not a problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This soap lathers very nicely and smells amazing. Is pretty affordable too, especially when there’s a sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent soap with minimal scent
reviews.reviewText: I usually use unscented products as I am very sensitive to odors but this soap sounded like just what I wanted so I gave the Mandarin Orange scent a try. Reviews had said it was very light and they are quite right. The soap moisturizes and has a very pleasant faint orange scent that I really like. I will be purchasing this soap again.

reviews.reviewerName: I just wish I could buy another battery.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Authentic castillian, olive oil soap.
reviews.reviewText: I'm a soap maker with no time at present. Most "olive oil soap" is actually pomace soap. Pomace is the remnant oil left in crushed olives. Nothing really wrong with it except that it is much cheaper to make. True castile soap is made of high quality, 100% liquid olive oil. The soap is creamy, almost white, and nothing is kinder to skin. It may not lather as much as other blends but it cleans just as well. It works as a shampoo bar, face and body bar. It's simply the best. A slight green, translucent bar is mostly olive oil with a small amount of pomace. A dark green or brownish green, with a slight odor is a pomace bar. If you care, this the absolute best. The only thing better is a home made bar like this that is a super fatted bar which a commercial bar is not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The scent is carried throughout each bar of soap
reviews.reviewText: I waited to review it until I used a couple bars. Often times the scent in a soap is only on the outside. This lovely lavender fragrance was present no matter how small the soap sliver. It has a lovely creamy feel. I am ordering it again.
